title: Her Majesty's Explorer: A Steampunk Bedtime Story
description: It's a dirty job, but he loves it. St.John Murphy Alexander walks the world exploring for the Queen. He sees the most extraordinary landscapes, creatures, and weather. He gets very, VERY dirty. Exhausted, he returns to H.Q. and gets ready for a well-deserved rest and some sweet dreams. This gentle book, written by steampunk novelist Emilie P. Bush and brilliantly illustrated by William Kevin Petty, is the perfect wind-down for your little adventurer.
author: Emilie P. Bush
